frontmatter.title: Components
frontmatter.description: Customizable components with an ecosystem of plugins.

frontmatter.title: Hidden
frontmatter.description: Hidden

frontmatter.title: Intro
frontmatter.description: Project overview and instructions to get stated.

frontmatter.title: Themes
frontmatter.description: UX themes with advanced interactions and animations.

frontmatter.title: Animation
frontmatter.description: Animation is a component with animation setup and utils.

frontmatter.title: Badge
frontmatter.description: Badge is a component for showing short and relevant tags.

frontmatter.title: Breadcrumbs
frontmatter.description: Breadcrumbs is a component for showing layered navigation states.

frontmatter.title: Button
frontmatter.description: Button is a component to style buttons, can also be applied to other tags.

frontmatter.title: Card
frontmatter.description: Card is a component for style boxed content.

frontmatter.title: Drop
frontmatter.description: Drop is a toggle plugin to show complex content relative to an element node and positioned relative to it.

frontmatter.title: Form
frontmatter.description: Form is a component for all form content has multiple layouts, custom checkbox/radio and more.

frontmatter.title: Global
frontmatter.description: Global is a component with global styles and javascript.

frontmatter.title: Group
frontmatter.description: Group is a component to group up buttons, inputs and other content.

frontmatter.title: Icon
frontmatter.description: Icon is a component to style svg icons.

frontmatter.title: Link
frontmatter.description: Link is a component to style default links, can also be applied to other tags.

frontmatter.title: List
frontmatter.description: List is a component to space any element with margins, also spaces vertically.

frontmatter.title: Listing
frontmatter.description: Listing is a component for category pages or simple listing.

frontmatter.title: Loader
frontmatter.description: Loader is a component to create animated loaders.

frontmatter.title: Media
frontmatter.description: Media is a component to wrap media asset and display them in various ways.

frontmatter.title: MouseFollow
frontmatter.description: MouseFollow is a plugin that manages animations that follow mouse position

frontmatter.title: Nav
frontmatter.description: Nav is a component to group up buttons, inputs and other content.

frontmatter.title: Overlay
frontmatter.description: Overlay is a toggle plugin to show interactive content over the main page with custom content and positions.

frontmatter.title: Pagination
frontmatter.description: Pagination is a component for pagination navigation.

frontmatter.title: Ripple
frontmatter.description: Ripple is a plugin that achieve Material ripple animation.

frontmatter.title: Row
frontmatter.description: Row is a component to space any element with paddings, also spaces vertically.

frontmatter.title: Scrollto
frontmatter.description: Scrollto is a plugin that manages interaction scroll with hash links or any node.

frontmatter.title: Scrolltrigger
frontmatter.description: Scrolltrigger component contains interactions for all sort of interaction on page scroll.

frontmatter.title: Slider
frontmatter.description: Slider is a toggle plugin for drag interactions and for interfaces that slide on one axis.

frontmatter.title: Stickyflow
frontmatter.description: Stickyflow is a plugin that enhance css sticky position by making it scroll the content also if overflowing the window.

frontmatter.title: Table
frontmatter.description: Table is a component with basic styles for tables.

frontmatter.title: Tabs
frontmatter.description: Tabs is a component to group up buttons, inputs and other content.

frontmatter.title: Textareaautosize
frontmatter.description: Textareaautosize is a plugin that manages automatic size on textarea.

frontmatter.title: Toggle
frontmatter.description: Toggle is a plugin for all interactions that toggle a class and respond to it.

frontmatter.title: Toolbar
frontmatter.description: Toolbar is a component to group up buttons, inputs and other content.

frontmatter.title: Tooltip
frontmatter.description: Tooltip is a toggle plugin to show simple content relative to an element node and positioned relative to it.

frontmatter.title: Typography
frontmatter.description: Typography is a component for automatic and customizzable styling of blank html content tags.

frontmatter.title: Googlelocator
frontmatter.description: Googlelocator is a plugin that manages google places and maps and markers.

frontmatter.title: InfiniteScroll
frontmatter.description: InfiniteScroll is a plugin that manages automating pagination loads with infinite scrolling.

frontmatter.title: Slider
frontmatter.description: Slider is a toggle plugin for drag interactions and for interfaces that slide on one axis.
